title: Washers and Dryers Included in Studios, Cyber Lounge
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 800 Sq.
Pinnacle Ridge is a beautiful apartment community located just west of Downtown Dallas.
Our prime location gives our residents stunning views.
We are proud to offer newly renovated units with white cabinetry, upgraded lighting and plumbing fixtures, plank flooring, digital thermostats, upgraded window coverings and more.

Pinnacle Ridge also offers a beautiful new pergola covered grill station and leash free dog park and as part of our continued efforts to provide our Residents with the best possible amenity package we are in the process of revitalizing several of our amenity spaces.
Ask our team about the new Leasing Office, Fitness Center, Conference Space, Cyber Lounge, and Outdoor Kitchen.
You won't believe your eyes at Pinnacle Ridge.
We are sure that you will love to call Pinnacle Ridge home.

Skyline Views, New/Renovated Interiors, Additional Storage, Designer Finishes, Lighted Ceilings Fans, High Speed Internet Access, 9-Foot Ceilings, Dishwasher, Premium Whirlpool Black Appliance Package, Built-in Microwave, Privacy Locks on All Bedrooms, Washers and Dryers Included in Studios, Large Pantries in Kitchen, Oversized Walk-in Closets, Luxurious Garden Tubs in Bath, Side-by-Side Refrigerator with Icemaker and Water, Crown Moulding, Cable Ready, Private Patios/Balconies

State-of-the-Art Fitness Center With Aerobic and Weight Machines, Covered Parking, Detached Garages, Resort-Style Swimming Pool with Lounging Ledge, Gated Community, Cyber Lounge, Poolside Wi-Fi, Club House, Conference Room, Package Receiving, Outdoor Kitchen and Cabana Area, Leash-Free Dog Park with Agility Equipment
Stop by the office to learn about specific pet policies.
